snippet: Jacob Stevens has filed a lawsuit against the Police Department in the death of his wife, who was hit by a car as she crossed the street.
abstract: Jacob Stevens files a lawsuit against the New York City Police Department in the death of his wife Clara Heyworth, who was hit by a car as she crossed a Brooklyn street; Stevens says an investigation by accident squad detectives was halted, and then not restarted until three days after Heyworth died from her injuries or four days after the crash, a delay that he says meant most of the evidence had been lost.
lead_paragraph: Jacob Stevens has filed a lawsuit against the Police Department in the death of his wife, who was hit by a car as she crossed the street.

headline.main: Police Unit Draws Scrutiny for Its Handling of Crashes Involving Pedestrians
headline.print_headline: Police Unit Draws Scrutiny for Its Handling of Crashes Involving Pedestrians
